question: Which of the following statements is not correct about the Right to Information Act?
option1: The Right to Information Act came into force on 12 October 2005
option2: The Freedom of Information Act, 2002 has been repealed
option3: The Official Secrets Act, 1923 has also been repealed
option4:
Central Information Commission and State
Information Commissions have been constituted
answer: The Official Secrets Act, 1923 has also been repealed
explanation: Right to Information (RTI) is an Act of the Parliament of India to provide for setting out the practical regime of right to information for citizens and replaces the erstwhile Freedom of Information Act, 2002.
